original_text: Then the Lord said to Jacob, “Go back to the land of your fathers and to your relatives, and I will be with you.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 야곱에게 이르시되 네 조상의 땅 네 족속에게로 돌아가라 내가 너와 함께 있으리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Jacob
Go back to the land of your fathers
and I will be with you
